On the lifecycle manager, the apache service must be listening for HTTP requests on port 79. Further, /opt/hlm_packager must be set as the document root. This is the default and automatic configuration for the Helion OpenStack deployment.

Every Neutron Open vSwitch server (Neutron controllers and Nova compute nodes) must have the apt service configured to use the following sources.
deb [arch=amd64] http://HLM_IP:79/hlm/hlinux cattleprod main contrib non-free
deb [arch=i386] http://HLM_IP:79/hlm/cmc32 cattleprod main

Replace HLM_IP with the IP address of your lifecycle manager. The preceding apt sources are configured automatically (in /etc/apt/sources.list.d) as part of the Helion OpenStack cloud deployment, and only require manual configuration if the defaults have been changed since deployment.

In addition to the standard network configuration described in Helion OpenStack network configuration, a physical network port on each Nova compute node must be plugged into the Cisco ACI fabric. The command sudo lldpcli show neighbors should reveal a router/leaf from the Cisco ACI fabric.lldpcli must be manually installed using the apt package manager in order to run the lldpcli command.

All of your Neutron controller nodes must be able to communicate with the APIC. Run the following command on your Neutron controller nodes to fetch the APIC login interface (the following command assumes that the APIC IP address is 10.105.1.10. Substitiute the IP address of your APIC if necessary).curl -k https://10.105.1.10

p.note: Some Cisco third-party software is not available via the internet, but is provided by offline resources.

Your lifecycle manager and Neutron controller nodes must have internet access to successfully run the automatic deployment playbook. If necessary, the automatic deployment playbook can make use of an HTTP/HTTPS proxy.

section.p:
To summarize the prerequisites:
Ensure that each Nova compute node has a dedicated network port that is connected to a Cisco ACI leaf.
Ensure that each Neutron controller node can communicate with the APIC.
Ensure that the lifecycle manager, as well as all Neutron controller nodes have internet connectivity.
